link_name: Homematic IP Water & Smoke Detector Monitoring
link_desc:
This template and scripts work together to automatically discover Homematic IP water and smoke detectors through the XML-API of a Homematic IP CCU3 appliance.

They monitor test results, battery level, alert conditions and much more.

An installation guide is available on the linked github page.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Custom Script|Dependent Items|HTTP Agent
